camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.serviceUrl.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.serviceUrl
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.serviceUrl.description: The Pulsar Service URL to point while creating the client from URI.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.authentication.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.authenticationClass
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.authentication.description: The Authentication FQCN to be used while creating the client from URI.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.authentication.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.authenticationParams
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.authentication.description: The Authentication Parameters to be used while creating the client from URI.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingEnable.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingEnabled
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingEnable.description: Control whether automatic batching of messages is enabled for the producer.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingMaxMes.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingMaxMessages
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingMaxMes.description: The maximum size to batch messages.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingMaxPub.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingMaxPublishDelayMicros
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.batchingMaxPub.description: Used if `batchingEnabled` is `true`. Sets the maximum time period within which the messages sent are batched.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.blockIfQueueFu.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.blockIfQueueFull
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.blockIfQueueFu.description: Whether to block the producing thread if pending messages queue is full or to throw a ProducerQueueIsFullError.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.initialSequenc.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.initialSequenceId
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.initialSequenc.description: The first message published will have a sequence Id of initialSequenceId 1.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.lazyStartProdu.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.lazyStartProducer
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.lazyStartProdu.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel’s routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.maxPendingMess.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.maxPendingMessages
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.maxPendingMess.description: Size of the pending massages queue. When the queue is full, by default, any further sends will fail unless blockIfQueueFull=true.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.maxPendingMess.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.maxPendingMessagesAcrossPartitions
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.maxPendingMess.description: The maximum number of pending messages for partitioned topics. The `maxPendingMessages` value is reduced if (number of partitions `maxPendingMessages`) exceeds this value. Partitioned topics have a pending message queue for each partition.

camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.producerName.name: camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.producerName
camel.kamelet.pulsar-sink.producerName.description: Name of the producer. If unset, lets Pulsar select a unique identifier.
